group_1.textCenter: I do appreciate you for understanding our@situation now...!
Still, it was YOU who watched from the sidelines@no matter what we said...
You, who were neither the Eradicators nor the@Advocates!
This is not the sympathy Rabi was talking about...
These people are void of feelings.
They are like flocks of snow swaying in the wind,@only being swept along...
Considering how Kuroda must've felt about losing@Haitani,
I can't imagine it's an easy thing to just yield...
What does it take for a single day to be free of all@the things I dislike about people...!

group_1.textRight: It can't be helped.
It's as everyone says, I'm just a murderer.
I was gonna destress by myself, but you were here.
...Just because I lost the girl I loved doesn't mean@I had the justification to kill others.
I knew that from the beginning.
When everyone around me stayed their hands,@I couldn't hold onto my arguments anymore.
You're a weird one, Miura, why are you angry on@my behalf?
Don't you know how bad I hurt you?

group_1.textLeft: I can erase the pain, I can heal the injury.

group_1.textRight: A normal person would've died.
Besides, there must've been many Magical Girls@who turned into Witches.
If that's death for you guys, and not escape...
We're no different from Witches.@We've killed so many people.
What's with that look...?

group_1.textLeft: If that's how you feel, then you can honor your@promise to Haitani.

group_1.textRight: My promise...?

group_1.textLeft: I can call the dead and speak with them.
"I don't want Kuroda to kill for me anymore."

group_1.textRight: I...see...

group_1.textLeft: There's been many twists and turns since then,@but the old Kuroda is back.
When I heard that, it hit me harder than anything@else ever did.

group_1.textRight: I was calmin' down, little by little...
Hey...Miura?
Please help the Magical Girls with reducin' the@escalating damage in Yukuni City.

group_1.textLeft: You want me to take out the Witches?

group_1.textRight: If there really would be fewer incidents and@accidents around town,
then I'll believe in you guys, and end the@Eradication Faction.

group_1.textLeft: You still want me to do my best.@That's a heavy request.
But,[chara:103401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103401:cheek_0][chara:103401:eyeClose_0][chara:103401:motion_0][chara:103401:lipSynch_1] I don't mind facing opponents that need@to be defeated anyway.

group_1.textRight: Of course.
...Honestly, I should be sentenced to death,@but it probably won't happen...
That's why, after I end the Eradication Faction,@I'm gonna head to a juvenile rehabilitation center...
I must carve into myself these sins that cannot@possibly ever be atoned for.
I don't feel like I can keep on living, let alone@face what the future holds...
